name: They Fly 2 DEMO
description:
CONTROLS: W to boost upwards, D to smash downwards, and P to shoot.

You seek out revenge on the Fly Queen for destroying your house.

The game progresses automatically, you only have to worry about surviving. But taking on an army by yourself is bound to get chaotic so you must use what little you have to come out on top.

Your character bounces up and down but you can interrupt your movement by shooting or using your rocket pack to avoid enemies. Meaning shooting serves two purposes; movement and offense.

NOTE that this is a demo that is missing a lot of content as well as an end.
